mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE SET POLL_NM=#{pollNm}, POLL_BGNDE=#{pollBeginDe}, POLL_ENDDE=#{pollEndDe}, POLL_KND=#{pollKindCode}, POLL_DSUSE_ENNC=#{pollDsuseYn}, POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC=#{pollAutoDsuseYn}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE POLL_ID=#{pollId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE , A.POLL_ENDDE , A.POLL_KND , A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID=#{pollId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE ( POLL_ID, POLL_NM, POLL_BGNDE, POLL_ENDDE, POLL_KND, POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{pollId}, #{pollNm}, #{pollBeginDe}, #{pollEndDe}, #{pollKindCode}, #{pollDsuseYn}, #{pollAutoDsuseYn}, sysdate(), #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_IEM_NM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_ID = #{pollId} ORDER BY POLL_IEM_NM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM ( POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_IEM_NM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM )VALUES( #{pollId}, #{pollIemId}, #{pollIemNm}, #{frstRegisterId}, sysdate(), #{lastUpdusrId}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT WHERE POLL_ID=#{pollId} AND POLL_IEM_ID=#{pollIemId}
